ygData.subject: Re: Lesser Faydark
ygData.msgSnippet: i dont know, but as a de necro the faeries attacked me.  i do recall them attacking me for being a de, however, so whether they hate necros in general i dont
ygData.messageBody:
i dont know, but as a de necro the faeries attacked me. i do recall them
attacking me for being a de, however, so whether they hate necros in general
i dont know. see if faerie maidens attack you, that is a good test. also,
the faerie guards are kind of slow, so you may outrun them if you have to;
either that or i just got lucky.

belphenor


>From: "Mata" <mata_eq@...>
>
>Does anyone know if I am KOS from Fairies or Pixies in Lesser Fay? Cus I
>wanted to go to the bandit camps there and din't want to have a RED CONING
>Fairy beat the tar out of me. I am a gnome Necromancer and I killed many
>orcs in CB but it didn't seem to help much w/ other races. I have done
>nothing to affect my fairy faction that I know of and was just wondering.
>
